introduction: SYNOPSISJi-na had received an abnormal amount of love from society and her home. She hangs out with the Manpo Gang who are hiroppon addicts, continuing her hallucinatory lifestyle. When the Manpo Gang runs out of money, they decide to rob Ji-na's home but they unexpectedly kill Ji-na's parents. Learning of their deaths, Ji-na exacts revenge on the Manpo Gang, one member at a time. She yearns to return to the way she was.故事他说，适应与hiroppong瘾君子满浦日新月异感受到来自社会或家庭生活异常信息继续出现幻觉。满浦天钱带走杀过去几天的父母，但在家里意外蟹，只会由多个满浦的写入一天去不是真正渴望回到原来的样子。
